function.name: cast
function.short: Cast quaternion/octonion variable to different data type.

long.para: cast converts the components of a quaternion to a different data type. By default, the components of a quaternion have the default &matlab; data type double.

examples.precode:
>> q = cast(quaternion(1,2,3,4), 'uint8')
q = 1 + 2 * I + 3 * J + 4 * K
>> class(q)
ans =
quaternion
>> class(x(q))
ans =
uint8
